description.narrative: The project development objective is to reduce commercial losses of UE's three regional power distribution companies in Tashkent City, and the Oblasts of Tashkent and Syrdarya by improving their metering and billing infrastructure, and the commercial management system.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement; Schedule II, Section I.A.2 | Description :The Borrower shall cause the Project ImplementingEntity (PIE) to maintain within OJSC ORGRES throughout the duration of the Project the Project Management Unit (PMU) with adequateresources and facilities, and professional staff in adequate numbers whose qualifications, experience and terms of reference shallbe acceptable to the Bank. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement; Schedule II, Section I.A.3 | Description :The Borrower shall cause PIE to maintain, throughoutthe duration of the Project, a PIU within each of the three regional distribution companies in Tashkent City and the Oblasts ofTashkent and Syrdarya, with adequate resources and facilities, and professional staff in adequate numbers whose qualifications,experience and terms of reference shall be acceptable to the Bank. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement; Schedule Section II.B.3 | Description :Maintain debt service coverage ratio (DSCR) of atleast of at least 1.2 times the estimated maximum debt service. | Frequency :Yearly
